text: Did you know that cervical cancer is a preventable disease?! 🚨👩‍⚖️ It's time to take action and eradicate it within our lifetime! 💪🏼 Get vaccinated and get tested regularly. 💉👍 Follow the American College of Obstetricians and Gynecologists recommendations for cervical cancer screening: 📅 Ages 21-29: Pap test every 3 years. 🚨 Don't wait, take control of your health! 💪🏼
